item.title: Burnley FC Owners Strike Deal With Chinese Toy Firm for Espanyol
item.description: The owners of Premier League team Burnley FC have struck a deal with the Chinese backers of RCD Espanyol de Barcelona SAD, with the two football clubs becoming part of a new multi-club structure.
